location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Ahwar Rapids. Longitudinal section of line of rocks below main line of rocks C.D., on plan of Rapids.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 135 x 510 mm

mods.abstract: This vertical map of the Ahwar [Ahvaz] Rapids illustrates the probable maximum high flood level and probable ordinary high flood level, and the rock types and heights, found at the longitudinal section of the main line of rocks on the plan of the Rapids (IOR/L/MIL/17/15/15, f 11).This item is one of three maps located on a larger sheet (folio 12).
